Description: Starts or stops playback. Plays in reverse if 'shift' is active.
Press and hold to fast-forward frame by frame.
Press and hold to fast-rewind frame by frame.
Activates 'shift' mode (Fn) for secondary functions.
Activates or deactivates Jog/Scrub mode.
Receives the Jog value (-1.0 to 1.0) to control speed and direction.
Toggles the Jog's relative speed mode, which is sensitive to the project's length.
Jumps to a point in the timeline based on a value from 0.0 to 1.0.
Enables or disables sending timecode feedback to the control surface.
Cancels playback, deactivates active tools, and reverts some operations.
Jumps to the start of the timeline.
Jumps to the end of the timeline.
Moves forward one frame.
Moves backward one frame.
Jumps to the next keyframe.
Jumps to the previous keyframe.
Jumps to the next marker.
Jumps to the previous marker.
Toggles the playhead follow mode.
Toggles the scene's global audio on or off.
Toggles audio scrubbing while dragging the playhead.
Toggles the follow mode for the 'traveler' or playhead.
Activates strip navigation mode. Single-press to activate, double-press to select.
Navigates to the next strip (horizontally) or increments the active tool's value.
Navigates to the previous strip (horizontally) or decrements the active tool's value.
Navigates to the strip above (vertically) or increments the active tool's value.
Navigates to the strip below (vertically) or decrements the active tool's value.
In navigation mode, adds or removes the 'traveler' strip from the current selection.
Moves the playhead to the start (or end with shift) of the active strip.
Toggles the selection filter for Video strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Image strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Meta-Strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Color strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Text strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Adjustment Layers.
Toggles the selection filter for Speed strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Transitions.
Toggles the selection filter for Scene strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Transform strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Mask strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Clip strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Audio strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Glow strips.
Toggles the selection filter for Blur strips.
Activates the Zoom tool (uniform scale).
Activates the Position X tool.
Activates the Position Y tool.
Activates the Rotation tool.
Activates the Origin (pivot) X tool.
Activates the Origin (pivot) Y tool.
Activates the Opacity (Alpha) tool.
Activates the left Crop tool.
Activates the right Crop tool.
Activates the top Crop tool.
Activates the bottom Crop tool.
Activates the tool to flip horizontally (Flip X).
Activates the tool to flip vertically (Flip Y).
Activates the tool to reverse frame playback.
Activates the color Saturation tool.
Activates the color Gain (Multiply) tool.
Cycles to the previous Blend Mode.
Cycles to the next Blend Mode.
Synchronizes the blend mode of all selected strips to match the active one.
Toggles snapping to default values for tools (e.g., zoom to 1.0).
Inserts a keyframe for the active tool's property.
In navigation mode, removes the 'traveler' from the selection. With tools, deletes the keyframe.
Sets the preview range to the duration of the selected strips.
Deletes the preview range.
Zooms to fit the selected strips in the view.
Activates the tool to drag strips on the timeline and between channels.
Performs a soft (Ripple) cut on selected strips and enters adjustment mode.
Performs a hard cut on selected strips and enters adjustment mode.
Activates the 'Heap' tool to evenly space the selected strips.
Performs a 'Splice' cut, deleting content to the left of the playhead and entering fine-tune mode.
Activates the 'Insert' tool to insert a strip between the cuts of other strips.
Toggles Snap mode for the 'Grab' tool.
Toggles snapping to the start of other strips.
Toggles snapping to the end of other strips.
Toggles snapping to audio strips.
Toggles snapping to muted strips.
Toggles snapping to markers.
Toggles snapping to keyframes.
Toggles snapping to the playhead.
Toggles snapping to the timeline start.
Toggles snapping to the timeline end.
Activates the tool to adjust the content's Offset Start.
Activates the tool to adjust the content's Offset End.
Activates the 'Slip' tool, which moves the content within the strip's boundaries.
Activates the 'Push' tool, which lengthens/shortens a strip's end and ripples subsequent strips.
Activates the 'Pull' tool, which lengthens/shortens a strip's start and ripples subsequent strips.
Activates the 'Sleat' tool, a 'Roll Edit' that moves the cut point between two strips.
Activates the 'Slide' tool, which moves a strip while adjusting the duration of its neighbors.
Opens the file browser to add a Video strip.
Opens the file browser to add an Image strip.
Opens the file browser to add an Image Sequence.
Opens the file browser to add an Audio strip.
Opens the file browser to add a Scene strip.
Adds a Text strip.
Adds a Color strip.
Adds an Adjustment Layer.
Adds a marker at the playhead position.
Creates a Meta-Strip from the selection, or separates a Meta-Strip if only one is selected.
Adds a Gaussian Blur effect to the selected strip.
Adds a Glow effect to the selected strip.
Adds a Speed control effect to the selected strip.
Adds a Transform effect to the selected strip.
Adds a Color modifier to the selected strip.
Adds a Crossfade transition between two selected strips.
Adds a Gamma Cross transition between two selected strips.
Adds a Wipe transition between two selected strips.
Adds an Adjustment Layer over the selection or the entire timeline.
Adds a Multicam selector over the selection or the entire timeline.
In navigation mode, creates a group from the selection (including the 'traveler').
In navigation mode
Handler File: removes the selected strips from their groups.

Description: Expands the selection to include all members of the involved groups.
Shows or hides group colors on the timeline.
Finds newly added strips and tries to group them automatically by similarity (Auto Mirror).
Toggles automatic grouping (Auto Mirror) when moving or adding strips.
Sets the time tolerance in seconds for Auto Mirror.
Sets the range of adjacent channels to consider for Auto Mirror.
Toggles automatic selection of the last created group.
Manually selects the last group that was created.
Toggles whether to expand selection to groups when exiting navigation mode.
Creates a fade-in from the strip's start to the playhead position.
Creates a fade-out from the playhead position to the strip's end.
Creates a crossfade in the overlapping areas of the selected strips.
Toggles between LINEAR and BEZIER fade curves.
In Preview mode
Handler File: changes the active camera. In AutoCut mode
column5: performs a cut and switches to camera N.

Description: Rebuilds the internal database of cameras and strips.
Toggles between Preview mode and AutoCut mode for /CAM/N commands.
Toggles cut mode for the Multicam FX tool.
Switches the active camera of the Multicam FX strip to camera N.
Enables or disables animation 'containers' (Empties) for cameras.
Deletes all animation 'containers' from the scene.
Activates the tool to move the camera forward/backward (Dolly).
Activates the tool to move the camera sideways (Truck).
Activates the tool to move the camera vertically (Pedestal).
Activates the tool to rotate the camera horizontally (Pan).
Activates the tool to rotate the camera vertically (Tilt).
Activates the tool to rotate the camera on its Z-axis (Roll).
Activates the tool to adjust the camera's focal length (Lens).
Activates the tool to adjust the horizontal lens shift (Shift X).
Activates the tool to adjust the vertical lens shift (Shift Y).
Toggles Depth of Field on or off.
Activates the tool to adjust the Focus Distance.
Activates the tool to adjust the aperture (F-Stop).
Activates the tool to adjust the number of aperture blades.
Activates the tool to adjust the aperture rotation.
Activates the tool to adjust the anamorphic distortion (Ratio).
Activates the volume adjustment tool.
Activates the stereo panning tool.
Toggles snapping to default values for audio tools.
Selects the modifier at position N on the active strip and sends its type as feedback.
Adds a Bright/Contrast modifier to the active strip.
Adds a Color Balance modifier to the active strip.
Adds a White Balance modifier to the active strip.
Adds a Curves modifier to the active strip.
Adds a Hue Correct modifier to the active strip.
Adds an Equalizer modifier to the active strip.
Mutes or unmutes the currently inspected modifier.
Deletes the currently inspected modifier.
Moves the inspected modifier up one position in the stack.
Moves the inspected modifier down one position in the stack.
Controls the shadows color (Lift/Offset) with an XY pad.
Controls the midtones color (Gamma/Power) with an XY pad.
Controls the highlights color (Gain/Slope) with an XY pad.
Controls the luminance (Value) of the shadows.
Controls the luminance (Value) of the midtones.
Controls the luminance (Value) of the highlights.
Controls the Brightness value of the Bright/Contrast modifier.
Controls the Contrast value of the Bright/Contrast modifier.
Controls the Red component of the White Balance modifier.
Controls the Green component of the White Balance modifier.
Controls the Blue component of the White Balance modifier.
Selects a node on a curve channel. If it doesn't exist
Moves the selected node on the curve's XY plane.
Resets the selected node's position to its default value.
Deletes the selected intermediate node.
Adjusts the frequency range of one of the 3 equalizer bands.
Resets all equalizer bands to their default values.
Activates the tool to adjust the active parameter of the Speed effect.
Cycles to the next speed control method (Multiply
Cycles to the previous speed control method.
Requests the current state of the speed control method.
In 'Multiply' mode, recalculates the input strip's duration to match the effect's.
Toggles frame interpolation in the Speed effect.
Cycles to the next Wipe transition type.
Cycles to the previous Wipe transition type.
Requests the current state of the Wipe transition type.
Inserts a keyframe on the Wipe transition type.
Toggles the Wipe direction (IN/OUT).
Toggles the Wipe's default fade.
Activates the tool to adjust the blur width of the Wipe's edge.
Activates the tool to adjust the Wipe's angle.
Activates the tool to manually animate the Wipe's progress.
Toggles the Crossfade's default fade.
Activates the tool to manually animate the Crossfade's progress.
Activates the tool to adjust the X blur of the Blur effect.
Activates the tool to adjust the Y blur of the Blur effect.
Toggles whether the Glow effect shows only the glow or the combined image.
Activates the tool to adjust the Glow's luminance threshold.
Activates the tool to adjust the Glow's clamp (brightness limit).
Activates the tool to adjust the Glow's boost factor (intensity).
Activates the tool to adjust the Glow's blur radius.
Activates the tool to adjust the Glow's quality (iterations).
Cycles through the interpolation modes of the Transform effect.
Requests the current state of the interpolation mode.
Toggles the translation unit (pixels or percent).
Requests the current state of the translation unit.
Activates the tool to toggle uniform scaling.
Activates the tool to adjust Position X of the Transform effect.
Activates the tool to adjust Position Y of the Transform effect.
Activates the tool to adjust Scale X of the Transform effect.
Activates the tool to adjust Scale Y of the Transform effect.
Activates the tool to adjust Rotation of the Transform effect.
Toggles the Lock state of channel N.
Toggles the Mute state of channel N.
Activates the tool to move the marker under the playhead.
Deletes the marker under the playhead.
Starts rendering the animation.
Plays back the last rendered animation.
Applies a predefined export preset (e.g.
Sets the render resolution scale (e.g.
Selects the next strip
Selects the previous strip
Deletes the current selection and intelligently selects the previous (or next) strip of the same type.
Toggles the 'same type' filter for quick selection.
Toggles the 'same channel' filter for quick selection.
Executes macro preset number N.
Requests the description for macro N
Toggles Blender's Auto-Keyframing mode.
Undoes the last action.
Redoes the last undone action.
Copies the selected strips to the clipboard.
Pastes the strips from the clipboard at the playhead position.
Duplicates the selected strips.
Toggles the Mute state of the selected strips.
Toggles the Lock state of the selected strips.
Saves the current .blend file.
Saves a new version of the file with an incremented number.
Enters or exits edit mode for a Meta-Strip.
Sets the current frame as the timeline start.
Sets the current frame as the timeline end.
